scripts.build-worker-lib: rollup -c rollup.config.js src/index.ts --output.file lib/worker-commands.js --output.format umd --name worker-commands
scripts.build-client-lib: TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATION=false rollup -c rollup.config.js src/bridge/client-side.ts --output.format umd --name sendcommand --output.file send-command.js
scripts.build: npm run build-worker-lib-es6 &&npm run build-worker-lib && npm run build-client-lib
scripts.demo: cp lib/worker-commands.js demo/worker-commands.js && cd demo && static-server
